Name: Example Homepage
Description of item/issue: The header banner is not accessible via keyboard navigation.
Recommended Fix: Add keyboard navigation support for the header banner.
High Risk: Please fix the header banner accessibility issue.

Name: Example Product Page
Description of item/issue: The product image lacks alt text.
Recommended Fix: Add descriptive alt text to the product image.
High Risk: Alt text added in the last release.

Name: Example Contact Page
Description of item/issue: Form labels are missing for input fields.
Recommended Fix: Add labels to all form fields.
High Risk: Form labels added in the latest update.

Name: Example About Us Page
Description of item/issue: The text contrast ratio does not meet accessibility standards.
Recommended Fix: Increase text contrast to meet minimum standards.
High Risk: Contrast issue persists in the latest QA check.

Name: Example Blog Page
Recommended Fix: Add captions to the embedded video.
